title: What Comes Next?
description: Given a pattern or sequence of words, numbers, or concepts, can you figure out what comes next? A fun test of pattern recognition!

questions.question: What comes next in this sequence: Monday, Wednesday, Friday, ___?
questions.explanation: The pattern skips every other day, so after Friday comes Sunday.

questions.question: What comes next: Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, ___?
questions.explanation: These are the colors of the rainbow in order (ROY G BIV). After Green comes Blue.

questions.question: What comes next: Do, Re, Mi, Fa, ___?
questions.explanation: These are the solfege musical notes in order. After Fa comes Sol.

questions.question: What comes next: January, March, May, July, ___?
questions.explanation: The pattern lists every other month. After July (month 7), skipping August, the next is September (month 9).

questions.question: What comes next in this letter sequence: A, E, I, O, ___?
questions.explanation: These are the vowels of the English alphabet in order. After O comes U.

questions.question: What comes next: Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, ___?
questions.explanation: These are the planets in order from the Sun. After Mars comes Jupiter.

questions.question: What comes next in this letter pattern: Z, Y, X, W, V, ___?
questions.explanation: The alphabet is being listed backwards. After V comes U.

questions.question: What comes next: Spring, Summer, Autumn, Winter, ___?
questions.explanation: The four seasons repeat in a cycle. After Winter, the cycle begins again with Spring.

questions.question: What comes next: Penny, Nickel, Dime, ___?
questions.explanation: These are U.S. coins in ascending order of value: 1¢, 5¢, 10¢, 25¢ (Quarter).

questions.question: What comes next in this pattern: AB, CD, EF, GH, ___?
questions.explanation: The alphabet is being listed in consecutive pairs: AB, CD, EF, GH, IJ.

questions.question: What comes next: Hydrogen, Helium, Lithium, Beryllium, ___?
questions.explanation: These are the first elements of the periodic table in order by atomic number. Element 5 is Boron.

questions.question: What comes next in this letter pattern: A, C, F, J, ___?
questions.explanation: The gaps between letters increase by 1 each time: A (+2) C (+3) F (+4) J (+5) O. Counting positions: 1, 3, 6, 10, 15 — and the 15th letter is O.

questions.question: What comes next: King, Queen, Rook, Bishop, ___?
questions.explanation: These are chess pieces listed in descending order of value. After Bishop comes Knight.

questions.question: What comes next in this pattern: Alpha, Bravo, Charlie, Delta, ___?
questions.explanation: This is the NATO phonetic alphabet. After Delta (D) comes Echo (E).

questions.question: What comes next: Ace, Two, Three, Four, Five, Six, Seven, Eight, Nine, Ten, Jack, Queen, ___?
questions.explanation: These are the 13 cards in a standard suit, in order. After Queen comes King.
